column2:
"<%me>!!
Good job! Thanks for gathering
the \"Moraine Fragments\" for me!"

"Yes, this is it, yes!
I wanted this!"

"Hm? What will I use them for? Um... Here's a one-word hint: \"counter.\" Let's
just say it's my way of returning the favor."

"That's all you're going to get, so let it go,
okay? Anyway, thanks for the help."
